#################################################

Release Name:
The.Elder.Scrolls.III.Morrowind.Code.Patch.Kit-WWW

#################################################

About This Patch Kit:

This kit will enable you to optimize and customize the Morrowind game application.
*The Morrowind Code Patch applies many bug fixes and additional capabilities.
*Timeslip's patcher will improve performance and reduce frequency of CTDs by recoding it to use sse instructions instead of fpu.
*The No-CD patch will allow you to run Morrowind without the cd.
*The 4gb patch will enable the Morrowind game application to utilize more memory if necessary.

There is a pre-patched Morrowind.exe for lazy users. There is also an extra unmodified Morrowind.exe in case you lose it

#################################################

How to use:

Novice:
1. Copy the Morrowind.exe file from the "pre-patched Morrowind.exe for lazy users" folder to your Morrowind directory, replacing it.
2. Enjoy!

Advanced:
1. Copy contents to your Morrowind game directory.
2. Run Morrowind Code Patch.exe and apply the fixes you want. THIS MUST BE DONE FIRST.
3. Run MorrowPatch.exe to apply Timeslip's sse optimizations. THIS MUST BE DONE SECOND.
4. Run TRASDs_Morrowind_Patch.exe and press enter four times to apply the No-CD patch.
5. Run 4gb_patch.exe and select the Morrowind.exe application and select OK.
6. Enjoy!
